overview: Everyone knows what charming places strip clubs can be, but perhaps there is no club so charming as one in Moriarty, New Mexicoâ€”a truck stop with taxidermy and the bras of former employees on the walls, a few poles, a shitload of black light, and plenty of titties. Never mind that The Ultimate Strip Club List website describes it as the place "where strippers go to die."
title: Life as a Truck-Stop Stripper
